name: TGF Games Pack
description:
If you came here expecting some games with banger art styles, you came to the wrong place. I'm just here to archive these 4 games I made back when I still utilized The Games Factory as a primary game engine.
Beware that 2 of these games are below the state of "rough".

GameSizeInfoCave(man) Story
58mbAttempt at a Cave Story fangame. Most of the size is music.
Sonic Reborn
11mbSonic fangame. The most complete of the bunch, yeah.
Taiko Tech Demo
6mbSelf explainatory. Very off-beat.
WarioWare16mbWarioWare formula attempt. Doesn't have the stakes.

All 4 zips also include a .txt file that explains the game in greater detail. Sonic Reborn, of course, gets the longest one.
